医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
妊娠期高血压疾病与产后心血管死亡率密切相关罗格斯健康中心的研究人员发现，妊娠期高血压与出生后一年内致命的心血管疾病密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Hypertential-disorders-in-pregnancy-strongly-linked-with-cardioangio-mortality-after-giving-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Hypertential-disorders-in-pregnancy-strongly-linked-with-cardioangio-mortality-after-giving-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cc78e9a-4319-41dc-bfcd-f1fc7757cd15 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 14:10:00 -0400 Hypertensive disorders in pregnancy strongly associated with cardiovascular mortality after giving birth
研究揭示脓毒症后免疫抑制机制细菌或病毒感染引起的严重脓毒症可能会危及生命，甚至从严重脓毒症中恢复的人也可能会对免疫系统产生长期影响，使他们更容易受到反复感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Research-sheds-light-on-post-sepsis-immune-suppression-mechanism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Research-sheds-light-on-post-sepsis-immune-suppression-mechanism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dafdc369-e3b7-470e-a602-656d383728d3 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 14:03:00 -0400 Research sheds light on post-sepsis immune suppression mechanism
非侵入性成像测试可识别需要心脏手术的患者一项新的研究表明，非侵入性成像测试可以帮助识别冠状动脉阻塞或狭窄的患者，哪些患者需要进行血运重建手术。 , https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Non-guarantee-imaging-test-identizes-患者-needing-heart-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Non-guarantee-imaging-test-identizes-患者-needing-heart-procedures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=654f1118-50dc-403d-948b-9d42c1f932fe Sat, 13 Apr 2024 13:54:00 -0400 Non-invasive imaging test identifies patients needing heart procedures
恢复胰岛素敏感性且无 TZD 副作用噻唑烷二酮类 (TZD) 是一类可通过逆转胰岛素抵抗（该疾病的主要特征之一）来治疗 2 型糖尿病的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Restoring-insulin-sensitivity-without-TZD-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Restoring-insulin-sensitivity-without-TZD-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=157198ca-d5d3-4eae-8ca9-c60df290d412 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 13:47:00 -0400 Restoring insulin sensitivity without TZD side effects
新的微流体装置改善了肿瘤细胞和肿瘤细胞簇与恶性积液的分离研究人员推出了一种微流体装置，可以显着改善肿瘤细胞和肿瘤细胞簇与恶性积液的分离。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/New-microfluidic-device-improves-the-separation-of-tumor-cells-and-clusters-from-malignant-effusions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/New-microfluidic-device-improves-the-separation-of-tumor-cells-and-clusters-from-malignant-effusions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6104f66-8514-4a6f-94d2-161ee5da41a3 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 13:40:24 -0400 New microfluidic device improves the separation of tumor cells and clusters from malignant effusions
整合健康的社会决定因素以增强心力衰竭风险预测凯斯西储大学最近的一项研究使用了患有糖尿病的美国退伍军人的全国数据来验证和修改广泛接受的用于预测糖尿病患者心力衰竭风险的模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Integrating-social-determinants-of-health-to-enhance-heart-failure-risk-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Integrating-social-determinants-of-health-to-enhance-heart-failure-risk-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3f93b9b-4c05-4312-a37a-cad851ca7a40 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 13:17:55 -0400 Integrating social determinants of health to enhance heart failure risk prediction
NCCN 2024年年会重点关注改善癌症护理的实际应用国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN)——领先的癌症中心联盟——在 4 月 5 日至 7 日举行的 NCCN 2024 年年会上接待了 1,700 多名肿瘤学专业人士。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/NCCN-2024-Annual-Conference-focuses-on-practical-applications-for-improving-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/NCCN-2024-Annual-Conference-focuses-on-practical-applications-for-improving-cancer-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f202b709-4df2-4603-8049-dcb7a4dfe17c Sat, 13 Apr 2024 13:06:26 -0400 NCCN 2024 Annual Conference focuses on practical applications for improving cancer care
民意调查发现，老年人接受非传统医疗服务当今天的老年人长大时，零售店内的紧急护理中心和诊所并不存在。但一项新的全国民意调查发现，他们中的大多数人现在已经接受这些非传统网站来获得医疗服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Older-adults-embrace-non-traditional-medical-care-poll-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Older-adults-embrace-non-traditional-medical-care-poll-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5703a8c-3f7d-43fe-af23-64a3dafb76ba Sat, 13 Apr 2024 13:02:01 -0400 Older adults embrace non-traditional medical care, poll finds
揭开胃食管连接部发育的奥秘从医学角度来看，从食道到胃的过渡是一个脆弱的区域，通常与导致癌症的病理性疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Unraveling-the-mysteries-of-gastro-esophageal-junction-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Unraveling-the-mysteries-of-gastro-esophageal-junction-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3112e768-7526-4b4c-b8a3-0031a184f91e Sat, 13 Apr 2024 12:49:00 -0400 Unraveling the mysteries of gastro-esophageal junction development
梅奥诊所的研究提供了对痴呆症清醒发作的见解梅奥诊所最近发表在《阿尔茨海默氏症与痴呆症：阿尔茨海默氏症协会杂志》上的一项研究调查了老年痴呆症晚期患者的清醒发作，提供了有关这些事件如何显现的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Mayo-Clinic-study-offers-insights-into-lucid-episodes-in-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Mayo-Clinic-study-offers-insights-into-lucid-episodes-in-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb5cd265-0a7d-4d70-bf7d-a26c20b9836a Sat, 13 Apr 2024 12:39:13 -0400 Mayo Clinic study offers insights into lucid episodes in dementia
